answers.answer: hello, ok go back to your doctor, and specifically ask for these tests in order- first a helicobacter-pylori breathe test, then if positive ask for an endoscopy and a colonoscopy in the same day, a further abdominal ultrasound will help in eliminating other possible disorders like gallbladder disease and bile duct blockage, these should alleviate your condition, laslty have you been tested for diabetes? cheers.
